messages.subject: Nursing Program - Free Tuition @ UDC
messages.msgSnippet: From one of my other loops... Robin This is a great opportunity for anyone who is interested in nursing, or knows anyone who is! Please pass it on to anyone
messages.messageBody:
From one of my other loops... Robin

This is a great opportunity for anyone who is interested in nursing,
or knows anyone who is! Please pass it on to anyone who may have an
interest!

Subject: FW: Nursing Program - Free Tuition @ UDC
Importance: High
------------
Nursing Program/free tuition
If you know of anyone between 18-28 years old, interested in the
Nursing field, University of the District of Columbia (UDC) is
offering FREE tuition, FREE books, a $250 monthly stipend, and
guaranteed job placement as a nurse at Providence Hospital upon
graduation (it's a 3 year program) with a starting salary of
$40,000. The program is recruiting new students now!!
Please contact Ms. Beshon Smith (202) 266-5481 or email
Bsmith@...<mailto:Bsmith@...>
SEND TO SOMEONE WHETHER THEY CAN USE OR NOT. THEY JUST MIGHT KNOW
SOMEONE WHO CAN!
